DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the safety and efficacy of intravenous 6β-Naltrexol administered to opiate dependent subjects
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study of Intravenous 6β-Naltrexol (AIKO-150) in Opioid-Dependent Subjects
DOC.criteria: Opiate dependent males and females age 2145 on stable doses of methadone Fluent English speaker Willing and able to give written consent Pregnancy or lactation FOR MORE DETAILS CONTACT THE RESEARCH CLINIC.
